segments.text: Is there a city where it's always warm ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there are many cities where it's almost always warm.San Diego , for example .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any other cities where it's always hot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many.Most of the cities in the southern part of the United States are hot all year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But why do so many people live there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most people grow accustomed to the climate , but there are many others who complain about it all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any cities where it rains a lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Several.Two good examples are Seattle , in the state of Washington , and Portland , Oregon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell us about some cold cities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the north there are many cities which are very cold in the winter.Boston and Chicago are two of them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it always cold in Chicago and Boston ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no.On the contrary , there are many beautiful days , especially in the spring and fall .
segments.speaker: S2
